oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On a remarkable formula of Ramanujan
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHAKRABARTI, D
SRINIVASAN, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gamma function
Fourier transforms
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple proof of Ramanujan's formula for the Fourier transform of |Gamma (a + it)|(2) is given where a is fixed and has positive real part and t is real. The result is extended to other values of a by solving an inhomogeneous ODE, and we use it to calculate the jump across the imaginary axis.
